questions.question: The tree has never …………………… fruit before.
questions.description: Borne is the past participle of bear.

questions.question: The tree ……………………….. plenty of fruit last year.
questions.description: The simple past of bear is bore.

questions.question: Alexander the Great …………………….. every opponent between Greece and India.
questions.description: The past simple of beat is beat.

questions.question: A pound of sugar is ………………………. enough for one week.
questions.description: Barely and hardly mean almost not.

questions.question: I ………………………….. barely see him.
questions.description: Barely has a negative force. You cannot use another negative with it.

questions.question: Everyone should be aware ………………………… the dangers of smoking.
The audience eagerly ……………………….. the speaker’s arrival.
questions.description: To await is to wait for.

questions.question: The settlers ……………………… the burning of the fort by destroying a native village.
questions.description: To avenge is to take vengeance for.

questions.question: Avail …………………………… every opportunity to get a good education.
The audience ………………………. happy with the play.
questions.description: Audience is a collective noun. Collective nouns are usually used with singular verbs.

questions.question: The accident ………………………. her of her husband.
questions.description: To bereave is to lose someone you love.

questions.question: The refugees arrived ……………………….. of their possessions.
